element.name: DESCRIPTION
element.text: This algorithm generates a raster layer form a points layer using the nearest neighbour interpolation method. The value assigned to a cell in the output layer is the value of the nearest input point.

element.name: FIELD
element.text: The field from the input layer that contains the value to be inteprolated.

element.name: RESULT
element.text: The resulting raster layer with interpolated values.
